page.title: 17THE MARKET,LLANGOLLEN.
page.content: Llangollen market is an{open air market and it is held every {Tuesday.}It can be found in the main {Car Park}in{Market Street.}The market is held on the site of an old {Smithfield}market.There are usually {26 stalls}in the market,selling items such as antiques, clothes, sweets, toys, hardwear, material,fruit and vegetables.Most of the{stallholders came from{Clwyd}itself,with one coming from{Liverpool.}They all earned a living in markets elsewhere during the week. In the winter mainly local people use the market,but in the summer there are lots of{tourists.}The most popular stalls are the fruit and vegetable and the clothes stalls.Most of the customers thought that they could buy good value items from the market.
